sentence.Network_en: It's a long way to go for two people in their seventies.
sentence.Network_cn: 对于两个七十几岁的人来说，这段路太远了。

sentence.Network_en: He lost two stone in weight during his time there.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在那儿的时候体重下降了2英石。

sentence.Network_en: I undid the bottom two buttons of my yellow and grey shirt.
sentence.Network_cn: 我解开了自己黄灰相间的衬衫上最下面的两个纽扣。

means.word_mean: 1. a game in which a pitcher allows the opposing team only 2 hits
